import React, { Component } from "react"; import "../css/homepage.css"; import { Container, UncontrolledAlert, Row, Col } from "reactstrap"; import { Grid, Cell } from "react-mdl"; import Bact from "../img/b1.gif"; class introduce extends Component { state = { num: 1 }; render() { return (
Join Us! - To protect yourself and your family!





101,019 Worldwide Cofirmed





{this.state.num} are using our webapp















{" "}







What do we offer?

Symptom checklist

To make sure you are healthy

professional doctors

To answer all kinds of questions

Online chat

24 hours a day 7 days a week
{" "}


Sign up today to meet your personal doctor



{" "}


Chat today to get the freshest information

); } } export default introduce;
